traitDescription: number of plants counted within plot or subplot during emergence
Seedling emergence rate

Number of days from sowing to the date when 50% of the plants in a plot have reached flag leaf emergence (ligulation) stage. Flag leaf is the last leaf to emerge from the whorl, positioned directly below the panicle.
Aboveground dry biomass
Fresh biomass
Ratio of dry weight to fresh weight
Top of the general canopy of the plant, discounting any exceptional branches, leaves or photosynthetic portions of the inflorescence
Height to top of panicle
Number of days from sowing to the date when 50% of the plants in a plot reach flowering (anthesis), defined as the time when 50% of the anthers on 50% of the plants in a plot have emerged.
Presence or absence of leaves showing desiccation. 1 = present, 0 = absent
Plant lodging: presence or absence of lodging or severe leaning within a plot. 1 = present, 0 = absent.
Categorical rating of lodging severity at harvest. 0 = none; 1 = light to moderate lodging; 2 = severe lodging
Temperature of the surface of a sunlit leaf.
Difference between the leaf temperature and the ambient air temperature
Leaf thickness estimate
Fraction of ground covered by plant
Number of elongated internodes on the main stem
Diameter of the stalk in the internodal area nearest to the given measurement height
Diameter of the thinnest axis of the stalk in the internodal area below the most recent fully developed leaf, including the true stem and leaf sheath
Diameter of the widest axis of the stalk in the internodal area below the most recent fully developed leaf, including the true stem and leaf sheath
Number of basal tillers
Length of leaf from tip to stem along the midrib
Width of leaf at widest point along leaf
Anthocyanin content in the leaf epidermis, expressed as a relative index
Leaf chlorophyll content, expressed as a relative index
Number of days from sowing to the date when grain development was observed in approximately 50% of the plants within a plot
Stomatal conductance is a function of the density, size, and open versus closed status of stomatal pores in the leaf.
Whole above ground biomass moisture content
Chlorophyll fluorescence-derived photosynthesis parameter, ratio of incoming light lost via non-regulated processes.
Chlorophyll fluorescence-derived photosynthesis parameter, ratio of incoming light that goes towards non-photochemical quenching
Photosynthesis-related parameter describing variable fluorescence at steady-state conditions
Photosynthesis-related parameter, estimate of non-photochemical quenching
Photosynthesis-related parameter, a photochemical quenching coefficient
Chlorophyll fluorescence decrease ratio, photosynthesis parameter described as an index of vitality
Fluorescence parameter associated with Photosystem II operating efficiency
Chlorophyll fluorescence-derived photosynthesis parameter related to quantum yield of Photosystem II
Relative value describing the concentration of chlorophyll in the leaf, ranges from 0 to 80
Photosynthesis-related parameter describing maximum variable fluorescence at steady-state conditions
Photosynthesis-related parameter describing minimum variable fluorescence during dark phase after steady-state
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 420 nm
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 530 nm
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 650 nm
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 730 nm
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 850 nm
Relative measure of leaf greenness, based on absorbance at 880 nm
Photosynthesis-related parameter, estimate of the fraction of Photosystem II centers that are in open state
Photosynthesis-related parameter describing proton motive force and activity of ATP synthase
Electrochromic shift: a photosynthesis-related parameter describing proton motive force
Linear electronic flux: total flow of electrons from antennae complexes into Photosystem II
Rate of flux describing max rate of protons exiting the ATP synthase, a photosynthesis-related parameter describing proton motive force
Absorbance at 420 nm
Absorbance at 530 nm
Absorbance at 605 nm
Absorbance at 650 nm
Absorbance at 730 nm
Absorbance at 850 nm
Absorbance at 880 nm
Absorbance at 940 nm
